PESN 2011 News:PESN:Archive:2011 - going forward in time PESN 2010 Featured / Best Exotic FE : Electromagnetic / Electrostatic > ERR Fluxgenerator > ERR Fluxgenerator Looks to 2011 to be a Year of Redemption - The Noahâ€™s Ark Foundation, which had a major setback in 2002 when 20,000 solid state generators were confiscated by the Japanese government, looks to 2011 to be a watershed year, both in its development of 100+ kilowatt generator systems, as well as battery and wastewater treatment technologies. (PESN; December 31, 2010) Featured
